div.div: The impact of trial type, trial night, environmental and morphological variables, and predator and non-predator presence on head movement rate, the amount of time predators and non-predators spent near the experimental area, the times at which the birds ascended to and descended from the roost, and roost selection.
div.p: F values (numerator degrees of freedom, denominator degrees of freedom) are displayed along with p-values for Aâ€“E; chi-square values (degrees of freedom) are displayed along with p-values for F.
